statements: SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30
SELECT customer_id, gender FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY gender
SELECT location, age FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_customers FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female'
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income BETWEEN 30000 AND 60000
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE income > 50000 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT gender, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age BETWEEN 25 AND 40
SELECT customer_id, income FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female' ORDER BY income DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE location LIKE '%New York%' AND gender = 'Male'
SELECT MAX(income) AS highest_income, MIN(income) AS lowest_income FROM CustomerDemographics
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT first_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT last_name, first_name FROM customers WHERE age > 30;
SELECT customer_id, last_name, first_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT group_name, group_description FROM customer_groups WHERE group_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY last_name DESC;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM customers WHERE age < 25 AND gender = 'M' ORDER BY first_name ASC;
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name, age FROM customers WHERE gender = 'F';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age BETWEEN 20 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC, last_name DESC;
SELECT c.first_name, c.last_name, cg.group_name FROM customers c JOIN customer_groups cg ON c.customer_id = cg.group_id;
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics;
SELECT customer_name, age FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM CustomerSegments ORDER BY segment_name DESC;
SELECT customer_name, location FROM CustomerDemographics WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id = 3;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, age, gender, location FROM CustomerDemographics
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments
SELECT segment_id, segment_name, description FROM CustomerSegments WHERE segment_id = 1
SELECT c.customer_name, s.segment_name FROM CustomerDemographics c INNER JOIN SegmentTargeting st ON c.customer_id = st.customer_id INNER JOIN CustomerSegments s ON st.segment_id = s.segment_id
SELECT * FROM CustomerDemographics ORDER BY age DESC, customer_name ASC
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT name, age, city FROM customers WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation FROM demographics WHERE income > 50000;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, quantity, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price >= 50.00 AND category = 'Electronics';

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.name, products.product_name, orders.quantity FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.quantity > 3;
SELECT customers.name, demographics.education_level, demographics.occupation FROM customers JOIN demographics ON customers.customer_id = demographics.customer_id WHERE demographics.income > 75000.00;

SELECT orders.order_id, customers.name, products.product_name, orders.quantity, orders.order_date FROM orders JOIN customers ON orders.customer_id = customers.customer_id JOIN products ON orders.product_id = products.product_id WHERE orders.order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics;
SELECT first_name, last_name, age FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, membership_status FROM segment_loyal_customers ORDER BY loyalty_points DESC;
SELECT customer_id, signup_date, marketing_channel FROM segment_new_customers WHERE marketing_channel='Online';
SELECT customer_id, income, occupation, city FROM segment_high_income_customers WHERE income > 100000;
SELECT * FROM customer_demographics ORDER BY age DESC, city ASC
SELECT first_name, last_name, gender FROM customer_demographics WHERE gender='Female' AND city='New York'

SELECT customer_id, loyalty_points, membership_status FROM segment_loyal_customers JOIN segment_high_income_customers ON segment_loyal_customers.customer_id = segment_high_income_customers.customer_id
SELECT customer_id, signup_date, marketing_channel FROM segment_new_customers WHERE marketing_channel='Online' AND signup_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31'
SELECT customer_id, store_location, average_purchase_amount FROM segment_offline_shoppers WHERE average_purchase_amount > 100 ORDER BY store_location
